channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on SCL Blog

item.title: The Return of CODRCG
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs LLC)
item.description: Weâ€™re thrilled to announce the return of CODRCG, the Call of Duty Random Class Generator, now fully open source and hosted on GitHub! After shutting down in 2022 due to server costs and code maintenance challenges, we’ve reimagined CODRCG to thrive on a modern, lightweight platform. What’s New? Open Source: CODRCG is now fully open source, welcoming contributions from developers and fans alike. Whether you’re interested in improving old features or creating new generators, your pull requests are welcome!
